product_name: Mountain Hardwear Yuma II Convertible Pants - Women's
long_description: Get out and get dirty in the women's Mountain Hardwear Yuma Convertible Pants. You'll love the versatility, durability and casual styling of the long-pants-into-knee-pants design. Legs zip off to create capri-length pants with 17 in. inseam. Lightweight nylon is blended with elastane for ample 4-way stretch so pants won't bind or catch; full-length inseam gusset ensures easy mobility. Mountain Hardwear Yuma Convertible Pants are treated with a durable water repellent finish to shed dirt and water. UPF 50+ sun protection. Micro-Chamois(TM) polyester-lined waist is soft and comfortable next to skin. Low-profile waist is seamless and conical; fine-tune the fit with the stretch drawcord. Drawcords at ankles cinch cuffs against boots to keep out trail grit. Concealed-zipper cargo pockets have internal reinforcement panels for extra security. Relaxed fit maximizes comfort without compromising your look.
